name: Tanks - Unity Project
description:
This is a Tank battle game which I made as part of a Unity live training, it's super fun to play and can be played with two players locally. If you want to build it yourself go here: https://unity3d.com/learn/tutorials/projects/tanks-tutorial

Controls for Blue Tank:

W & S: Moves forward / back

A & D: Rotates left / right

Space Bar: Shoots (Hold to shoot farther)

Controls for RedTank:

Up Arrow & Down Arrow: Moves forward / back

Left Arrow & Right Arrow: Rotates left / right

Enter key: Shoots (Hold to shoot farther)
